posts.content:
For Sale:

1964 Sundial Walkthrough Splitscreen, runs and drives great completely solid, dry state import.

Flat 4 Banjo Steering Wheel
Safari Windows
Hehr Crankout windows (all refurbished)
Weed Beater Front Beam
Creative Front Disc Conversion
Dual circuit Brakes
Rancho Freeway Flyer Gearbox
Bugtech Shifter
1835cc Engine
Tuned and Jetted (76hp)
Twin IDF 40 Webbers
Vintage Speed Stainless Exhaust
Alternater Conversion
Breather System
Creative IRS
Creative Bay Drums
Habbit Battery
Split Charging system
Zig Mk1 12V Control Panel
Dometic 3 Way Fridge
SMEV 8323 3 Burner Hob Sink Combination
12v/240v LCD TV/DVD
Inverter
Alpine Stereo (2 amps, sub and 4 speakers)
Dormobile elevating roof\
Front Roof Rack


Has been used and enjoyed by the family for the last 5 years but now it’s time for someone else to enjoy her.

More pictures can been seen on the page that I look after….

https://www.facebook.com/VW-Sundial-EZ- ... 648409953/

£25,000
